summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4736 for the improvement of the alley in block 1, Daniel's University Grove Addition, being the alley between East 45th Street and East 47th Street, 4th Avenue Northeast and 5th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54821, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
